Translations.Text: Tumharay pass to musa yehi daleelen ley ker aaye lekin phir bhi tum ney bachra pooja tum ho hi zalim

Jab hum ney tum say wada liya aur tum per toor ko khara ker diya (aur keh diya) kay humari di hui cheez ko mazboot thaamo aur suno! To enhon ney kaha hum ney suna aur na famani ki aur inn kay dilon mein bachray ki mohabbat (goya) pila di gaee ba sabab inn kay kufur kay. Inn say keh dijiye kay tumhara eman tumhen bura hukum dey raha hai agar tum momin ho
Aap keh dijiye kay agar aakhirat ka ghar sirf tumharay liye hai Allah kay nazdeek aur kissi kay liye nahi to aao apni sachaee kay saboot mein maut talab kero
Lekin apney kartooton ko dekhtay huye kabhi bhi maut nahi maangen gay Allah Taalaa zalimon ko khoob janta hai

Bulkay sab say ziyada duniya ki zindagi ka harees aey nabi! Aap enhin ko paayen gay. Yeh hirs-e-zindagi mein mushrikon say bhi ziyada hai inn mein say to her shaks aik aik hazar saal ki umar chahata hai go yeh umar diya jana bhi enhen azab say nahi chura sakta Allah Taalaa inn kay kaamon ko bakhoobi dekh raha hai

(aey nabi!) aap keh dijiye kay jo jibraeel ka dushman ho jiss ney aap kay dil per paygham-e-baari taalaa utaara hai jo paygham inn kay pass ki kitab ki tasdeeq kerney wala aur mominon ko hidayat aur khushkhabri denay wala hai
(To Allah bhi uss ka dushman hai) jo shaks Allah ka aur uss kay farishton aur uss kay rasoolon aur jibraeel aur mikaeel ka dushman ho aisay kafiron ka dushman khud Allah hai
Aur yaqeenan hum ney aap ki taraf roshan daleelen bheji hain jin ka inkar siwaye bad kaaron kay koi nahi kerta
Yeh log jab kabhi koi ehad kertay hain to inn kay aik na aik jamat issay tor deti hai bulkay inn mein say aksar eman say khali hain
Jab kabhi inn kay pass Allah ka koi rasool inn ki kitab ki tasdeeq kerney wala aaya inn ehal-e-kitab kay aik firqay ney Allah ki kitab ko iss tarah peeth peechay daal diya goya jantay hi na thay

Aur uss cheez kay peechay parr gaye jissay shayateen (hazrat) suleman ki hukoomat mein parhtay thay. Suleman ney to kufur na kiya tha bulkay yeh kufur shetanon ka tha woh logon ko jadoo sikhaya kertay thay aur babul mein haroot maroot do farishton per jo utaara gaya tha woh dono bhi kissi shaks ko uss waqt tak nahi sikhatay thay jab tak yeh na keh den kay hum to aik aazmaeesh hain tu kufur na ker phir log inn say woh seekhtay jiss say khawind-o-biwi mein judaee daal den aur dar-asal woh baghair Allah Taalaa ki marzi kay kissi ko koi nuksan nahi phoncha saktay yeh log woh seekhtay hain jo enhen nuksan phonchaye aur nafa na phoncha sakay aur woh bil yaqeen jantay hain kay iss key lenay walay ka aakhirat mein koi hissa nahi. Aur woh bad tareen cheez hai jiss kay badlay mein woh apney aap ko farokht ker rahey hain kaash kay yeh jantay hotay
Agar yeh log sahib-e-eman mutaqqi bann jatay to Allah Taalaa ki taraf say behtareen sawab enehn milta agar yeh jantay hotay
Aey eman walo! Tum nabi (PBUH ko) Raaeena na kaha kero un-zurna kaho yani humari taraf dekhiye aur suntay raha kero aur kafiron kay liye dard naak azab hai

Na to ehal-e-kitab kay kafir aur na mushrikeen chahatay hain kay tum per tumharay rab ki koi bhalaee nazil ho (inn kay iss hasad say kiya hua) Allah Taalaa jissay chahaye apni rehmat-e-khusoosiyat say ata farmaye Allah Taalaa baray fazal wala hai
